message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,500?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $15,000 is already a competitive price for what this product offers. Could you meet me halfway at $13,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,900?
